definitions: a device for indicating an aircraft's rate of climb or descent.
shortDefinitions: device for indicating aircraft's rate of climb or descent

definitions: an inductor whose total inductance can be varied by altering the relative position of two coaxial coils connected in series, or by permeability tuning, and so can be used to tune an electric circuit.
shortDefinitions: inductor whose total inductance can be varied by altering relative position of two coaxial coils connected in series

definitions: an instrument for measuring variations in the intensity of the earth's magnetic field.
shortDefinitions: instrument for measuring variations in intensity of earth's magnetic field
